name: City Taxi Driving
description:
In this most new really big city adventurous game real taxi driver 3D sim, your duty as taxi driver duty starts today. Take your seat behind the real steering wheel of vehicle in this 3d taxi driver simulation game

Features
- Full 3D taxi simulator realistic environment
- Pick and Drop of the Passengers
- Crazy extremely difficult missions
- Hundreds of Hours of City Taxi Driving gameplay
